title: TheStage AI Elastic Models: Flux 1 Schnell

container_group_name.title: Container Group Name
container_group_name.description: Must be 2-63 lowercase letters, numbers, or hyphens. Cannot start with a number or start or end with a hyphen.

huggingface_access_token.title: HuggingFace access token
huggingface_access_token.description: Your HuggingFace access token for weight access. Make sure you have requested access to black-forest-labs/FLUX.1-schnell weights.

thestage_auth_token.title: The Stage auth token
thestage_auth_token.description: Your TheStage auth token for optimised model access.

auth_token.title: Authorization token
auth_token.description: Authorization token with will be used to protect inference endpoint from public access.
